import React from 'react' import logo from './images/logo.svg' import { FaBars } from 'react-icons/fa' import {useGlobalContext} from './context' const Navbar = () => { const {openSidebar,openSubmenu,closeSubmenu} = useGlobalContext() const displaySubmenu = (e)=>{ const page = e.target.textContent const tempBt = e.target.getBoundingClientRect() const center = (tempBt.left + tempBt.right) / 2 const botton = tempBt.botton - 3 openSubmenu(page, {center, botton}) } const handleSubmenu = () => { } return
} export default Navbar
